member.name: CRYPT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_VALUE
member.summary: The CRYPT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_VALUE structure contains a single attribute value. The Value member's CRYPT_OBJID_BLOB is encoded.

member.name: CRYPT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_VALUE.pszObjId
member.summary: Object identifier (OID) that specifies the attribute type data contained in the Value BLOB.

member.name: CRYPT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_VALUE.Value
member.summary: A CRYPT_OBJID_BLOB that contains the encoded attribute. The cbData member of the CRYPT_OBJID_BLOB structure indicates the length of the pbData member. The pbData member contains the attribute information.
